issue.title: [CF 1320] Add currency Ancient Mana
issue.body:
What version of TellMeWhen are you using now? ("The latest" is not a version)
8.1.2

What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?
Add "Ancient Mana" and preferably also "Max Ancient Mana" to the currency list so we can use it as a condition.

Please provide any additional information below.
I'd like to show an icon to use Mana Divining Stone when I'm not at full Ancient Mana, but disable the buff (and also the minimap icons) when I am at full.
I would figure I'd make a condition for the Buff check "Ancient Mana == Max Ancient Mana"


> Posted by CurseForge user Hemar | Imported from CurseForge issue #1320 | Raw
